title: Whole Foods Says It Will Stop Selling Foods Made With Prison Labor
text:
Whole Foods Says It Will Stop Selling Foods Made With Prison Labor 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
Whole Foods Market has announced that by April of next year it will stop sourcing foods that are produced using prison labor.The move comes ...
